PP LEADER ROPE

Recommended uses are mooring, dock and anchor line, boat, lifeline, tarpaulin, tent tiedown, pool barrier line, public utility and general use at home, farm and industry.

Strength

Stronger in wet weather than dry. Yet so light, it floats, does not absorb water, does not rot or decay. Resistant to acid, alkali and all chemicals.

avaliable

PP FILM
PP DANLINE
PP MONOFILAMENT
PP MULTIFILAMENT

Features

- Dia: 6mm to 28mm
- Customize length and color
- Available in 8 carriers, 16 carriers and 24 carriers
- Moderate elongation, high strength, and abrasion resistance, easy to splice
- Resist mildew, rot and most chemicals, UV stabilized
- Applications involving general marine, industrial, commercial, and general use
